text:
UNIVERSITY OF SOUTHERN CALIFORNIA
UNIVERSITY PARK
LOS ANGELES 7
February 25, 1958
Professor Sam L. Becker, Director
Division of Television-Radio-Film
State University of Iowa
Iowa City, Iowa
Dear Sam,
Many thanks for your note and for your suggestions
regarding the inventory-digest of radio research. John
Parsey has said that we may proceed with this project,
and we are planning to do our very best in the way of
providing an evaluation as well as a summary. We do hope
to emphasize methodology as well as findings.
Very best wishes to you.
Cordially,
Kenneth Harwood, Chairman
Department of Telecommunications
